ValidationRule.description: If the status is "Cancelled" the stage can not be changed to any previous stage.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Cancelled') , OR( ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Quoted'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Pending Payment'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Requested Cancellation'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Active'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'In Active') , ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Non Renewed'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Purchased ERP'), ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Expired') ) )
